projects.title: MOVIETIPIA
projects.description: This is a simple movie website user's can get information about the movies by searching the name. it uses free OMDB Api to provide us the informations related to the choosen movie.

projects.title: NEWSTOPIA
projects.description: This is news providing react website for user's to check out technology related latest news updates. this website uses free api to provide user's latest news updates.

projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: This is crypto currency tracking website such as exchage rates, currency scenerio of market related to specific crypto currency etc. this provides user's fair idea of crypto currency trends and prices.
